checks.name: SSL Certificate Validity
checks.description: SSL certificate is valid and trusted.

issuer.commonName: Go Daddy Secure Certificate Authority - G2

checks.name: HTTP Strict Transport Security
checks.description: HSTS header is missing. Enable it to prevent protocol downgrade attacks.

checks.name: Content Security Policy
checks.description: CSP header is missing. Add it to prevent XSS and data injection attacks.

checks.name: X-Frame-Options
checks.description: X-Frame-Options header is missing. Your site may be vulnerable to clickjacking.

checks.name: X-Content-Type-Options
checks.description: X-Content-Type-Options header is missing. Set it to 'nosniff' to prevent MIME-type sniffing.

checks.name: Referrer-Policy
checks.description: Referrer-Policy header is missing. Configure it to control referrer information leakage.

checks.name: Permissions-Policy
checks.description: Permissions-Policy header is missing. Use it to control browser feature access.

checks.name: SPF Record
checks.description: No SPF record found. Add one to prevent email spoofing.

checks.name: DMARC Record
checks.description: No DMARC record found. Add one to specify email authentication policy.

checks.name: DKIM Record
checks.description: No DKIM record found for common selectors. DKIM may use a custom selector.

checks.name: Server Version Disclosure
checks.description: Server header discloses version: 'ip-100-74-4-217.eu-west-2.compute.internal'. Remove version info to reduce attack surface.

checks.name: Cookie Security
checks.description: No cookies detected on the initial response.

checks.name: CMS Version Exposure
checks.description: No common CMS (WordPress/Drupal/Joomla) version exposure detected.

checks.name: Mixed Content
checks.description: No mixed content detected — all resources appear to load over HTTPS.

checks.name: Open Redirect
checks.description: No open redirect patterns detected in response headers.
